title: Crime Alert 09.20.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 09.20.21
description:
Wearing underwear and covered in blood, a murder suspect asks to clean up in a strangers shower. Little boy avoids sex assault by crawling under a shower stall.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
